alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:30PM EST until March 07 at 9:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EST FOR SCHUYLKILL...CENTRAL DAUPHIN AND LEBANON COUNTIES... At 730 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Branchdale to Colonial Park, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Lebanon, Pottsville, Hershey, Palmyra, New Cumberland, Tamaqua, Linglestown, Schuylkill Haven, Shenandoah, Lemoyne, Myerstown, St. Clair, Colonial Park, Progress, Steelton, Paxtonia, Annville, Hummelstown and Minersville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 78 from mile markers 0 to 8. Interstate 81 from mile markers 66 to 139. Interstate 83 from mile markers 42 to 50. Interstate 283 near mile marker 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
